scripts.asbuild:debug: asc assembly/raytracing.ts --target debug --enable simd --enable relaxed-simd --exportRuntime --runtime incremental
scripts.asbuild:release: asc assembly/raytracing.ts --target release --enable simd --enable relaxed-simd --exportRuntime --runtime incremental
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release
